text: Walk this way! Leggy Ashley Tisdale turns the sidewalk into a catwalk as she struts around in a tight mini dress Ashley Tisdale certainly knows how to put her best foot - or leg - forward. The 28 - year - old confidently strode through Beverly Hills, California, on Tuesday showing off her toned pins. The High School Musical star turned the short walk from a store to her car into a fashion show, strutting it for a crowd of fans and photographers. Legs eleven : Ashley Tisdale confidently strode through Beverly Hills, California, on Tuesday showing off toned legs The actress went for a punky yet feminine look wearing a tight mini dress featuring a pyramid pattern teamed with studded combat boots.
